title: Bloomberg Markets: Perreault on Verizon Preparing for Harvey
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Perreault on Verizon Preparing for Harvey
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Leo Perreault Executive Director of Network Verizon Communications Discussing preparing network reliability and mobile equipment for the impact of Hurricane Harvey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
